p: Numerous studies have suggested that zebrafish are a promising model for epileptic seizures and ASD screening [ 25, 26, 27]. The PTZ-induced zebrafish seizure model shares similar characteristics with mammals, including abnormal locomotor and electroencephalographic (EEG) activity and upregulation of c-fos expression, a biomarker of epileptic seizure [ 28, 29, 30].
